summary: A corporate raider buys up shares in an undervalued company and falls in love with the founder's son's lawyer/step daughter. Let the battle begin.
cast: Danny DeVito|Gregory Peck|Penelope Ann Miller|Piper Laurie|Dean Jones|R.D. Call|Mo Gaffney|Bette Henritze|Tom Aldredge|Leila Kenzle|Cullen O. Pearson|Patrick James Grosswendt|Raul Kobrinsky|Woodrow W. Asai|Ken Kensei|Shirô Oishi|Philip Perlman|Denise Lynne Roberts|Janet M. Smith|Kevin Christy Hayes|Richard Arlen Chapman|Dennis J. Malone|Kevin Lord|Marianne Lewis|Tessa Gaynor|John D. Bair|Rick Bean|Jeffrey Corazzini|Mary A. DeBriae|Dave Droge|Patricia Holihan|Kathy Najimy|Javier Ronceros|Jerry Slover
title: Con el dinero de los demás
